Trustee_14_pre_3.name: Juan Carlos Reyes
Trustee_14_pre_3.content: During the investment process, I have displayed a commitment to fairness and trust, ensuring that the allocation plan favored the interests of the investor. The successful profit distribution underscores my dedication to ethical practices and enhances my reputation as a reliable investment partner. I value cooperative relationships and prioritize the well-being of all participants, which contributes positively to my standing as a trustee.

Investor_14_pre_4.name: Juan Carlos Reyes
Investor_14_pre_4.content: During the investment process, I maintained a cooperative and transparent approach, adhering to the previously agreed allocation plan and fostering a constructive relationship with the trustee. My commitment to fairness and mutual benefit has solidified my reputation as a trustworthy and altruistic investor, enhancing my potential for successful future transactions.
